pullRequest.title: HBASE-25199 Remove deprecated HStore#getStoreHomedir methods
pullRequest.bodyText:
Remove the deprecated methods HStore#getStoreHomedir(Path, RegionInfo,
byte[]) and HStore#getStoreHomedir(Path, String, byte[]).

commit.message:
HBASE-25199 Remove deprecated HStore#getStoreHomedir methods

Remove the deprecated methods HStore#getStoreHomedir(Path, RegionInfo,
byte[]) and HStore#getStoreHomedir(Path, String, byte[]).

nodes.bodyText: I think we should have a replacement of this method, instead of replacing the caller with the code of this method directly just like an inline?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -511,32 +511,6 @@ public OptionalLong getMaxMemStoreTS() {
     return StoreUtils.getMaxMemStoreTSInList(this.getStorefiles());
   }
 
-  /**

commit.message: HBASE-25199 Move getStoreHomedir methods to HRegionFileSystem
